overview:
Marina Slavina graduated from Pace University with BA in Finance and Economics and an MBA degree in Financial Management. While at Pace, Marina was a finalist in the university held â€œBusiness Plan Competitionâ€ and traveled abroad as part of social entrepreneurship classes and interests. She worked as an analyst at a start-up Investment Advisory firm, where she prepares investment proposals, pitch books and business plans for institutional investors, individual investors and the Indian State Governments.

Marina is a co-founder of Mobilestead - a mobile applications provider.
